com.heaton.bot
Class HTMLForm

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.heaton.bot.Attribute
        |
        +--com.heaton.bot.AttributeList
              |
              +--com.heaton.bot.HTMLForm
public class HTMLForm
extends AttributeList

The HTMLForm class is used to create a response to an HTML form, and then transmit it to a web server. Copyright 2001 by Jeff Heaton

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jeff Heaton
